description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

BNP Paribas Fortis Easy Banking App. Have your bank at hand. Anytime, anywhere.

Our banking app allows you to manage your daily banking transactions wherever and whenever you want in complete security: make payments, track your balance, request and monitor insurance policies, loans and investments, and more. You can manage everything on your smartphone or tablet.

If you'd like to use the app, download it and create a profile. 

Not yet a customer? Download the app and become a customer via the app.

Whether you’re a private or professional customer, the ING Banking app allows you to have your bank at your fingertips at all times and to manage your money easily and in complete security, wherever you are. 

-	Pay or receive money at any time, thanks to Apple Pay and payments via QR code.
-	Manage your accounts, cards, preferences, notifications and more, all in one place.
-	Savings, investments, insurance, loans: tailor your banking services to your needs.
-	Benefit from cashbacks from major brands. 
-	Track your spending with the tools included in the app and actively manage your finances.
-	Get help via the ING digital assistant 24/7 or from an advisor during office hours.
-	Take part in exclusive competitions and win fantastic prizes! 

Not a customer yet? 
Open a current account with the help of itsme® - it’s simple, fast and totally secure! 

Already a customer? 
Install the app in less than 2 minutes with the help of itsme®, your ID card or with your ING card reader and ING debit card. 
After that, you will be able to log in easily using a 5-digit secret PIN code, your fingerprint or facial recognition. 
For your security, the app is automatically locked after 3 minutes of inactivity.

Paying friends back, buying a new pair of shoes online, paying the electricity bill quickly or settling up for those purchases in-store: it’s so quick and easy to do using the Payconiq by Bancontact app on your smartphone.

Fast, simple mobile payments are within hand’s reach. Connect your Bancontact card, link your bank account to the app and you can start making mobile payments right away. Without jeopardising security: you confirm every payment using your personal PIN code. It’s really quick and easy!

You can use the Payconiq by Bancontact app to make mobile payments anywhere you find Bancontact or Payconiq as a mobile method of payment. You do require a Belgian bank account.


This is what Payconiq by Bancontact enables you to do:

∙ No cash or cards needed in-store: with your smartphone in your pocket or bag, you always have your wallet with you.
∙ Pay online without a card-reader: paying online has never been so simple, thanks to the app.
∙ Pay bills and invoices quickly by scanning a QR code.
∙ Pay back friends and family in an instant with the app. And you can do it remotely, too!

Download the Payconiq by Bancontact app on your smartphone. For more information, visit www.payconiq.be

This Payconiq by Bancontact app stores information on your mobile device and accesses information on your mobile device to make registration and authentication possible for security reasons. The Payconiq by Bancontact app uses Google Analytics to track and analyse usage anonymously within the Payconiq by Bancontact app. By downloading, installing or using the Payconiq by Bancontact app, you agree for the Bancontact Payconiq Company to store information on your device and to access information on your device. For more information, including about how consent can be withdrawn and how you can opt out of Google Analytics, as well as your right to access, amend and object to the processing of your personal data for promotional purposes, please read the Bancontact Payconiq Company privacy regulations on www.bancontactpayconiq.com.

KBC Mobile: the best banking app in the world

Looking to take care of your banking and insurance needs quickly and securely? Want to make payments, transfer funds or check your account balance without using a card reader? Well you can, whenever and wherever you want with KBC Mobile on your smartphone or tablet. It's not for nothing that independent research agency, Sia Partners, has named KBC Mobile the best banking app in the world! 

Even if you don't have a current account with us, you can still use KBC Mobile to do things like buy public transport tickets or cinema tickets. 

If you already have a current account with us, you can use our Mobile app to the full. That includes having access to a host of handy additional services. For instance, you can pay for parking, order service vouchers and easily rent a shared car or bicycle. What’s more, our app will help you every step of the way with your home plans, whether that’s buying a property, renovating or making energy-efficient improvements. 

KBC Mobile also has lots of other neat features that you can use for doing things, such as personalising your accounts by adding a photo, hiding amounts on screen for more privacy and customising your start screen to suit your needs. And, of course, our digital assistant Kate is also on hand to assist you. Just tap the search bar at the top of the app’s screen and ask your question.

If you opt for our ‘Personalised’ service, you can pick up cashback rewards from KBC and our partners using Kate Coins you receive or earn.

If you're curious to find out more, download KBC Mobile for free now or visit www.kbc.be/en/mobile.

Belfius Mobile

Discover Belfius Mobile, your bank that is always within reach, accompanying you everywhere. Simple, fast and secure, Belfius Mobile is designed to offer you a unique banking experience.
Make your transfers and payments, manage your finances, insurance, investments and current loans with ease.

Manage it all in the blink of an eye
Check your account balances and history and find a payment. Personalise your overview with the accounts and widgets that interest you, such as your investments or your Re=Bel portfolio.

Invest in the stock market with Re=Bel
With Re=Bel, our integrated investment platform, you can get started in the stock market with complete autonomy. Invest in funds, shares and trackers connected with the societal themes that matter to you, at attractive prices. Manage your investments wherever and whenever you want.

Your insurance at your fingertips
To make your life easier, you can take out insurance for your car, home or pet with Belfius Mobile. You can also make a claim and follow it up. All in just a few clicks.

Always there for you
Need help? We're here for you! Easily make an appointment at a branch or for a video call. Have a question? Contact us by phone or ask our digital assistant.

Using Belfius Mobile for the first time? We'll guide you!
Register your device with your bank card and card reader. Then log in using your PIN code, digital fingerprint or facial recognition.
Not a Belfius customer yet? Become one straight away via the app.

Security and innovation at the heart of Belfius Mobile
Belfius Mobile is extremely secure. No personal information is saved on your device. To take advantage of the latest features and security standards, make sure you always use the latest version of the app.

Address of the head office:Belfius Bank SAPlace Charles Rogier 11 - 1210 Brussels

Your new favourite app, always at your fingertips!

With the MyAG Employee Benefits app, you can quickly and easily check the insurance covers you have through your employer. It's your go-to place to get an overview of all your fringe benefits, send in claims, make requests and contact AG. This app gives you access to your secure personal area.
 

Note: The app is only available to participants with a corporate-sponsored plan (via their employer or their partner's employer).
www.MyAGEB.be

Explore a world of and benefits with the Monizze app! Unlock a seamless and user-friendly experience that allows you to effortlessly manage your vouchers, ensuring both smoothness and security. Consult your balance, your latest transactions, and conveniently locate nearby shops that accept Monizze.
Your balance, just a tap away
Consult your balance in real-time and have a detailed history of your transactions, wherever you are and at any time.
Your favourite merchants at your fingertips
Easily find merchants near you accepting Monizze and discover new places. You can use the interactive map and refine your search with the filter to find tens of thousands of merchants and for a unique shopping experience.
Our benefits platform Dealzz doubles your purchasing power
Via the app you also have access to Dealzz. Benefit from attractive promotional offers and maximize your advantages. On Dealzz there are more than 100 interesting offers and discounts throughout the year. You will find two types of deals advantageous gift cards and promo codes. Enjoy big brands, your favourite activities, local merchants, and restaurants!
Download the app today to fully enjoy the Monizze experience!

Join over 17 million users worldwide who trust tricount to split bills, track expenses, and settle up—free and unlimited.

tricount is the easiest way to split costs, manage group expenses, and settle balances with friends, roomies, or your partner. Whether you're organizing a trip, splitting rent, or going out to dinner, tricount helps you stay on top of every bill—fairly and stress-free.

Why Choose tricount?
• Free & unlimited – No subscription, no hidden fees, no limit on tricounts or expenses
• Fair splits – Even for uneven amounts
• Great for roomies, couples, friends, or any shared situation
• Ideal for cost split on rent, trips, groceries, shared budgets, and more
• Real-time bill tracking with clear payback and balance overviews
• Send and receive payment requests instantly through the app
• Built-in calculator for easy amounts per person
• Share expense photos and track everything—even offline
• Supports multiple currencies for international trips
• Better than spreadsheets—and easier than Splitwise

Whether you're planning a getaway, splitting a check, or managing household costs, tricount is the smart, simple way to share expenses and stay organized.

Download tricount today – the best way to split, track, and settle group expenses. 100% free, unlimited, and trusted by millions.

Accountable frees you from the hoops and hurdles of being independent by giving you the tools you need to pay your taxes and manage your business.


The Accountable app helps you:


- Prepare and submit all your tax obligations, stress-free. No prior tax knowledge required. From VAT return to income tax: we got you covered.
- Create, personalise, and send unlimited (e-)invoices for your clients on your phone or on your computer. We notify you as soon as you get paid.
- Never lose a deductible expense again –just scan your receipt and we make sure it gets deducted from your taxes. You also get tailored tax tips and can match the expense with the relevant bank transaction.
- Connect your bank account and see what you should set aside for taxes and what you can safely spend in real time.
- Prepare your taxes yourself or share your data with your accountant. All your documents are ready for them in your account.
- Our tax coaches can help you with all your questions. Just send us a message: support@accountable.eu


================

Accountable PRO and SMALL

- Accountable PRO is made for all independents who charge VAT. It covers all your tax obligations, so that you can handle your complete bookkeeping and taxes confidently by yourself. You enjoy full access to our desktop and mobile app.
- Accountable SMALL is made for all independents who are exempt of VAT. Just like Accountable PRO, SMALL enables you to submit all your tax returns and manage your complete bookkeeping from your desktop or mobile phone.


Free version without ads and unlimited (e-)invoicing available!

- You can choose between a monthly or yearly Accountable SMALL or PRO subscription
- Payment of the Accountable SMALL and PRO subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account at the confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s account settings after purchase.
- Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings.
- After canceling your subscription, your subscription will remain active until the end of the current month before you are moved to our Free plan.


Terms and conditions: https://www.accountable.eu/en-be/terms
Privacy policy: https://www.accountable.eu/privacy


Address:
Accountable SA, 22 drève des Weigélias, 1170 Brussels, Belgium
Accountable SA Deutschland, Wattstraße 11, 13355 Berlin, Germany

Accountable SA is authorised by the National Bank of Belgium. With its PSD2 licence, Accountable SA in Germany is subject to the supervision of the National Bank of Belgium as well as the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin) in Bonn (Directive (EU) 2015/2366). In addition, the Deutsche Bundesbank in Frankfurt was informed of Accountable SA’s offer by the Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) in a letter dated 26 March 2020.

Hello bank! is a banking service which is 100% mobile. It is offered free of charge and includes a current account, a maximum of two bank cards, and savings accounts. 

The application is:
• Completely secure:
You access our banking services using your own unique Easy Banking code, which you set up. You receive the same level of protection as you already enjoy when you use your bank card and PIN.
• Has a full help service:
The Hello team is on hand 83 hours a week to answer your questions and help you carry out your transactions. 

To try Hello bank! free of charge: install the app

The Hello bank! app gives you access to your banking world, you can use your bank and you have a clear view of your income and spending. 

A few useful features:
• You can log in with your fingerprint or via facial recognition if your phone is equipped with this option.
• The Bancontact function: this enables you to make payments via your smartphone by using the QR code .
As easy as saying "Hello!"
1. Download the free app
2. Submit your request from the app (takes no more than 4 minutes!)
3. Your Hello box and card reader are sent to your home address 
4. Upon approval of your application, we then prepare your bank card(s) and the PIN you need to activate them. 

Like to know more? Just ask!

Telephone +32 (0)2 433 41 45, Monday to Friday (7am to 10pm) and Saturdays (9am to 5pm).
Or send an email to info@hellobank.be or read our FAQs at: https://www.hellobank.be/faq 

Hello bank! from BNP Paribas Fortis.

Join the 4 million customers who have already opened a Nickel account!

With Nickel, open an account, get an international Mastercard, and a local IBAN in just 5 minutes!
             
It's simple, fast, and open to everyone, with no conditions. All you need is a valid ID (190 passports accepted) and €25 to open your account.
  
Register online in minutes at https://nickel.eu/ and pick up your card immediately at one of our Nickel points of sale.                      

Once your account is open, you can rely on our mobile app to simplify your daily life!
            
With the Nickel app, you can:

Manage your account daily:
- Check your balance in real time
- Increase or decrease your payment and withdrawal limits
- View your card's PIN code
- Update your personal information     
                
Pay and get paid:
- Make standard and instant transfers 100% free
- Schedule recurring transferts to make your life easier
- View and share your IBAN         

Security:
- Instantly block and unblock your card if you lose it
- Block and unblock online and/or contactless payments.
- Set up personalized alerts to notify you if a transaction exceeds a certain amount or if a payment is made abroad
                
Additional service:
- Access the international money transfer service with Ria
                
Nickel points of sale and customer service:
- Find the nearest Nickel point of sale 
- Check our online FAQs 
- Find out how to contact our customer service

Bolero, that is the number 1 in self-investing.

Monitor the stock market and your portfolio in real time with the quick and easy-to-use Bolero iPhone app, voted best online investment bank since 2020. React instantly to important stock market news and invest securely in a broad range of shares, ETFs, bonds, turbos, options, etc. on more than 20 markets.

Curious about the possibilities of the Bolero-app?

•	Get an instant and personalisable portfolio view, customizable to your preferences. Your absolute gains and losses are also viewable.
•	Get a concise overview of a security, ETF,… using the Hotspot which displays price & valuation data and an identity card. Get access to the history of our own positions and blocked positions, clear graphs, the latest news, analyst ratings and more. This overview is also customizable.
•	Newborn investor? We got you covered with info buttons overall through the app. Not sure how to fill in your order? Just tap the info button and you are guided through each step.
•	Get inspired in News with market news from ABM Nieuws, Reuters, idea lists like the most traded stocks at Bolero and an extensive market overview. Also our daily newsletter “Beurs bij ‘t Ontbijt” is available in the app, so you can quickly respond to opportunities.
•	Keep track of your own favorites through useful watchlists. You can track the opening rate and reset your list of favorites on a date of your preference.
•	Set your own alerts and be immediately informed of important price changes. Monitor prices and the depth of the market in streaming real-time.
•	Consult the breakdown of your cash account across different currencies (euros, dollars, sterling, etc.) and customize it following your preferences.

By downloading and using the app, you accept the terms and conditions governing its use (available in the app).

Bolero clients can download the iPhone app completely free of charge. Not a client yet? Go to www.bolero.be and open your free account.

For KBC-clients, your Bolero portfolio is also available in the KBC Mobile app.

Discover the Beobank app. View your latest operations and news from your home page. One-click access to all the most common features.

Not yet a Beobank customer? Become a customer easily in less than three minutes using our app with itsme® .

Are you using the app for the first time? Activate it directly with itsme® or with your username, password and Digipass if you have one. Then log in with your passcode or your Face ID / Touch ID.

With the Beobank app you can:
- view your accounts, cards and transaction history
- manage your budget with our budget management tool
- make transfers (instantly or scheduled) between your accounts or to your beneficiaries
- create, consult and modify your standing orders and direct debits
- consult and pay your invoices via Zoomit
- easy access to Payconiq by Bancontact
- manage transfer limits and debit card limits
- consult all of your documents (account statements, contracts, etc.)
- manage your insurance contracts and report your claims
- manage your securities accounts
- check your loans
- apply for products and follow your requests
- chat with Pixy, our virtual assistant
- contact and make an appointment with your advisor
- validate your purchases securely on the internet via your app

A problem? A question ? Do not hesitate to contact Beobank Service Center on 02 622 20 00 or your branch.
More informations ? Visit  www.beobank.be

Met de Crelan Mobile-app voert u uw banktransacties eenvoudig en veilig uit. Altijd en overal, thuis of elders, zelfs in het buitenland. De app is gebruiksvriendelijker dan ooit. En helemaal gratis.

Download hem en registreer u (hiervoor moet u klant zijn van Crelan). Vervolgens logt u in en ondertekent u uw transacties veilig met de zelfgekozen pincode, itsme®, uw digipass (optioneel), gezichtsherkenning of met uw vingerafdruk.

De app zit in een moderne Crelan-stijl. Het dashboard geeft alle rekeningen weer waarvan u eigenaar, mede-eigenaar of gevolmachtigde bent. U hebt de mogelijkheid om bepaalde rekeningen als favoriet in te stellen, maar ook om andere niet in het overzicht weer te geven. U beslist!

Met de paarse zwevende ‘actie’-knop gaat u rechtstreeks naar handige functionaliteiten zoals overschrijvingen, betalen of geld ontvangen via een QR-code (Payconiq) of een betaalverzoek sturen via WhatsApp, sms of e-mail.

Uiteraard kunt u als klant met de Crelan Mobile-app makkelijk: 

•	een rekening openen (zicht- en spaarrekening),
•	een debetkaart aanvragen,
•	snel verrichtingen uitvoeren en beheren,
•	makkelijk het overzicht op uw financiën behouden en uw kredieten en beleggingen consulteren,
•	uw rekeningen en kaarten beheren,
•	snel een afspraak maken met uw Crelan agent of bellen/mailen met customer care.

Bij Crelan werken we continu aan de Mobile-app om hem te optimaliseren en er nieuwe functies aan toe te voegen. Vertel ons gerust wat u ervan vindt.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Managing your insurance has never been easier with our Ethias app:

· available anytime, anywhere
· simple and secure access via the itsme® app
· your insurance documents, such as your proof of insurance and your contracts, always at hand
· 24/7 damage reporting and follow-up
· manage your preferences effortlessly

Always have access to your contracts and documents!
This app is the safest way to access your personal Customer Zone. You want to have a quick look at your contracts or invoices? You need your proof of insurance immediately? You have to report a claim after an accident or want to ask for a refund after a hospitalisation?
No more paperwork, all you need is in the app.

In the app, you can easily update your personal data, manage your invoices or adapt your preferences.

With the free Argenta app you’ve always got your bank in your pocket. Completely safe. And you don’t need your digipas.

Why the Argenta app?

There are lots of reasons why Argenta customers use the app. They find banking with the app easy. Clear. And above all handy.

• Payments to a beneficiary’s account are received in a few seconds. 
• You know what’s in your account at all times and wherever you are.
• You can make a quick simulation for e.g. a loan or insurance.

Is the Argenta app safe?

Rest assured. Everything you do with the Argenta app is processed via a secure connection. Personal information is never stored on your mobile or tablet. 
The latest version of the app is always used. This gives you access to the very latest possibilities and your app is always optimally protected.

How to start using the Argenta app?

This is what you need:
• An Argenta current account
• An Argenta bank card 
• A digipas or itsme account

When you use the app for the first time:
1. Register on the Argenta app with your digipas or itsme account.
2. Choose a 5-digit pin code.
3. Now you can log on securely using your pin code or digital fingerprint. 

Questions? Suggestions? Or maybe a compliment?

Share them with us. Use the contact form on app.argenta.be. Or via the Contact section in the menu on the app. Based on your feedback we can optimise our app further. 

Want to know more? Check app.argenta.be.

Important! Only Argenta België customers can use the Argenta app. Still don’t have an Argenta current account? Make an appointment at an Argenta branch near you.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Thanks to its innovative usability and design the Keytrade Bank app enables you to manage your accounts in your own way, to visualize your investments as well as investing directly on the main stock markets worldwide.
Moreover the interactive follow-up of the markets is available for everyone.

BANKING & TRADING COMBINED IN ONE APP
- Consult all your accounts (current account, trading account, savings account) and execute all your banking operations.
- Follow the evolution of the markets and analyze the stocks via our Global Analyzer tool.
- Visualize the distribution and the profitability of your portfolio (stocks, funds, bonds, options, warrants, trackers, etc).
- Trade on the main stock markets worldwide.
- Can be used with Keytrade ID and Access Password, HardKey or SoftKey. 
- Multiple user profiles enabled on one device.

A NEW EXPERIENCE
- Personalize your accounts with your own pictures.
- Log in or sign transactions using Touch ID and Face ID (iPhone X only)
- Execute money wires in a simple gesture to internal and external accounts.
- Follow the markets via interactive heat maps.
- Rediscover the performance of your portfolio using interactive charts.
- Instantly visualize the amount and costs of your trade .

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
